name: Pretend
description:
Pretend is an arcade game, an adaptation of the classic party games Mafia and Werewolf. It is a game of murder, accusations, deceit, and survival.
Play with 4-15 players online or via the local network, as you attempt to uncover who pretends to be a worker - by completing tasks and discussing with other co-workers.

How to Play


Pretend Has 2 Unique Roles.

Before a game starts, players are put into a lobby. Players are then assigned roles randomly from the start. Players have an in-game role card that explains their role's abilities and alignments.

Each role has specific goals, and they are listed below -





You are sent by a large software company into the office of a small indie group - and your main goal is to destroy them and prevent the release of their software.

  • Kill the employees to destroy the company.
  • Pretend to run tasks and avoid getting exposed.
  • Sneak through ventilation, to move faster.
  • Sabotage, in order to cause chaos.






You are a hard-working fellow, whose main goal is to finish developing the software by completing tasks or find out who is pretending to be an employee.

  • Complete tasks in order to develop the software and win.
  • Find out who the pretender is, by discussing and analyzing other employees
  • Use security cameras and other tools in order to expose the pretender.
  • Chat and vote out the suspected pretender.
  • Eat food and go to the toilet to ensure a good daily routine.

And more roles coming soon...

Features

  • Free to play & browser compatibility.
  • Voice and text chat with other employees during Emergency Meetings.
  • Customize your character with random accessories.
  • Get a pet to look better ( or even create one ).
  • Cross-platform multiplayer between PC, Tablet, iOS, and Android
  • Play via a local connection or online with your friends or strangers!
  • Account limitation for leaving the match prematurely.

Coming soon...

  • Other roles - such as detective or medic. (if possible)
  • New maps with tons of new quests.
  • Exclusive skins and customizable pets.
  • Better textures and game optimization.
  • And any other good suggestions ;)
